EmailTemplate.description: When Partner POC has reviewed and Approved the award then notify Program Officer
EmailTemplate.name: PartnerPOCReviewComple
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Award {!Award__c.Name} has been accepted by {!Award__c.GranteeOrganization__c} agency
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This email is to notify you that, the Award {!Award__c.Name} for the Grant #{!Award__c.Grant__c} has been accepted by {!Award__c.GranteeOrganization__c} agency. Sincerely, {!Award__c.GranteePOC__r.Name}
